Date: Monday, 6/2/1993
Subject: Progress of Mark Wohlers
Dear Sir,
Mark Wohlers is doing pretty good at AA Canton-Akron Indians!
He has an ERA of 3.32, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 6/3/1993
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Mike Scioscia
